Thank you for taking the time to speak with me to review your account and help you get started. I wanted to recap the highlights of our call and ensure you have all necessary information regarding the setup of your account.
Lighthouse 360 Portal
To log in to your portal just go to home.lh360.com. Your username is {!Lighthouse_Worksheets__c.Portal_Username__c}. To recover your password click here. Be sure to bookmark this information for future reference.

You can turn on the inactive features at any time, so feel free to reach out to us if you change your mind and we can easily get them set up for you. The Feedback campaign helps you gather more patient reviews on Google. If you’d like to monitor those reviews from the portal, we’ll need help accessing the office’s Google My Business page. If you’d like to take advantage of this feature and haven’t spoken to our team yet, click here.
Contacting Us
